title: 求配置好了的菜单插件和文本
txt_content:
求配置好了的菜单插件和文本
最好是配置好了的
插件和配置文本都要

replies.author: xt00
replies.txt_content:
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&1&l天盟-&4&lNDNS&9&l生存服务器&3&l菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 6

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'menu'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item to 0)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################
tq:
  COMMAND: 'cshop open'
  NAME: '&b&l[*] 天券商城 [*]'
  LORE:
    - '&a&l[[v]]&6&l[+]点击打开天券商城界面[+]'
    - '&a&l[[v]]&6&l[+]/cshop open[+]'
  ID: 399
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 6
  AMOUNT: 2
  KEEP-OPEN: false
